attributes.action: Make law that all dogs outside should wear mussels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the law to make sure that all dogs bred for fighting/hunting eg greyhounds, terriers etc should be made to wear mussels as they are a danger to cats and other small animals.

rejection.details: Please change your reference to "mussels" (a kind of seafood) - do you mean "muzzles"?
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
